alert.note: Alert for Lake of the Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:54AM CDT until July 18 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR EASTERN ROSEAU AND WEST CENTRAL LAKE OF THE WOODS COUNTIES... At 554 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Salol, or 8 miles east of Roseau, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Swift. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
